mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderresult (productId, productName, price, quantity, imagePath, userId, UserName, email, tel, userAddress, orderDate, orderNumber, totalPrice, billingDate) VALUES(#{productId }, #{productName}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{imagePath}, #{userId}, #{UserName}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{userAddress}, SYSDATE, ORDERNUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{totalPrice}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT productName, price, quantity, imagePath, userId, UserName, email, tel, userAddress, orderDate, orderNumber, totalPrice, billingDate FROM orderresult
